description: This file defines a DoctorService class responsible for interacting with the backend API to perform CRUD operations related to Doctor objects, such as fetching, updating, and listing doctors. It also includes an extension for a safe HTTP PUT operation.

classes.name: DoctorService
classes.description: Service class providing methods to interact with doctor-related API endpoints.

methods.name: getMyProfile
methods.description: Fetches the profile of the current doctor.

methods.name: updateMyProfile
methods.description: Updates the profile of the current doctor with provided data.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves a list of doctors with optional pagination and query parameters.
